channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors brace for ‘unpredictable spillovers’ in markets after Trump announces Iran strikes

item.title: As Trump badgers Fed to lower rates, it’s the bond market in need of convincing
item.description: Trump wants lower interest rates as two of his signature policy initiatives face looming deadlines.

item.title: I’m 51, earn $129K and have $165K in my 401(k). Can I afford to retire when my husband, 59, draws Social Security at 62?
item.description: “He is retired from a state job and receives a pension that nets around $3,600 per month, as well as lifelong health insurance for both of us.”

item.title: The so-called SPAC king prepares to launch another: ‘The last time wasn’t a success by any means’

item.title: Trump pledged not to cut Medicare — but his budget bill does just that
item.description: The GOP megabill now under Senate consideration threatens healthcare insurance for more than 1 million seniors who rely on Medicare.

item.title: 5 stocks to buy for the second half from investors
item.description: Wall Street investors interviewed by CNBC singled out Amazon, Nvidia and Newmont as their top stock picks for the second half of 2025.

item.title: Where Goldman sees the best opportunities for income in the second half of the year
item.description: This year, investors can find attractive opportunities for income, according to Goldman Sachs Asset Management.

item.title: How activist Barington Capital can collaborate with Victoria’s Secret to improve shareholder value
item.description: Barington is no stranger to Victoria's Secret, having been at L Brands prior to the spinoff of the lingerie retailer.

item.title: How the MicroStrategy bubble could pop, hurting your portfolio
item.description: The bitcoin treasury company is at risk of a "boom and a bust cycle," according to a JPMorgan strategist.
